Case studies

GoGram goes global with ConvWave and achieves
stunning digital results in first month

GoGram is a professional instagram promotiong tool (also known as Tooligram), came to KlientWave with the goal of extending their business to the international level & acquire new users around the world through Google Ads traffic with the desired cost per convertion $3.00

Already within the initial 14-days test period, KlientWave reach the $2.50 conversion cost and after the optimization decreased cost per acquisition on 44% and has achieved $1.40 cost per lead.

What we did

Global keywords research (934.485 keywords)

A separate approach to each country

Conversion tracking optimization

53%

lower than desired
Cost per Convertion

46%

increase in convertion
volume

15.2%

Convertion rate
achieved

15.4%

Click through rate
achieved
